thread.title: Heads of the Valleys closed due to accident at Dowlais
thread.title_full: Heads of the Valleys closed due to accident at Dowlais | Wales - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Heads of the Valleys closed due to accident at Dowlais
text:
Traffic Wales says the Heads of the Valleys Road is closed both ways between Dowlais Top roundabout and the Rhymney Interchange.
Credit: Google Street View Heavy traffic is building following the accident involving one vehicle and fallen power cables. Emergency repairs are recovery work is underway.
Last updated Fri 21 Aug 2015 Travel South Wales Merthyr Tydfil
